text: Erin Wall (4 November 1975 â€“ 8 October 2020) was a Canadian-American operatic soprano. She was born in Calgary, Alberta. In July 2002 she made her international debut in London with a performance in the War Requiem of Benjamin Britten. She spent most of her career with the Lyric Opera of Chicago. In April 2009, she started her career with Metropolitan Opera in New York as Donna Anna in Don Giovanni. Wall died on 8 October 2020 from problems caused by breast cancer in Mississauga, Ontario at the age of 44. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Singers from Chicago Category:Canadian singers Category:North American opera singers Category:People from Calgary
title: Erin Wall
